description.value:
Average Height : 6'0" - 6'5"

Average Weight : 200 - 230

Ability scores : +2 Constitution, +2 Strength

Size : Medium

Speed : 6 squares.

Vision : Low-light

Languages : Common, Giant

 

ORC FEATURES

Running Charge

When you charge, add 2 to your speed.

Warrior's Surge

You can use warrior's surge as an encounter power.

 

ORC RACIAL POWER
